name: Connection Age
description:
CONNECTION AGE

Connection Age is an endless, randomly generated survival and strategy game where you have to link planets in chains to obtain ressources.

HOW TO PLAY CONTROLS:

   Left Click: Drain Connections

   Right Click: Link Connections

   Mouse Wheel: Zoom

DRAIN CONNECTIONS:

Drain Connections are used to drain ressources from a planet

They are costy and go less far, and you can't do any other
connections from it

LINK CONNECTIONS:

Link Connections are used as a relay to other planets
They are cheaper, go further and can support multiple connections

RESOURCES AND SHOP:

You have to manage 4 resource types: Iron, Food, Petrol and Money
Iron is used in connections, Food and Petrol are used by your population 
(if they drop to 0 you lose), and Money exchanged in the shop (bottom left)

EVENTS:

Every now and then you have a chance to trigger an event
said event can be either a positive one or a negative one

LORE

It's year 2311, the Earth has now more than 15 billion humans in it. Wars are being declared all over the continents for the last bits of petrol and fuel. During this time,  the main leaders of the world came together and created a program called "Connection Age" - the goal is to create spatial connections to other planets in order    to drain their resources. You are now in charge of this project, but beware! Your resources are very limited and time is ticking fast
